---
title: "ggplots"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
data(ChickWeight)
ggplot(ChickWeight, aes(x = Time, y = weight))
```

```{r}
ggplot(ChickWeight, aes(x = Time, y = weight)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = Diet))
```

```{r}
ggplot(ChickWeight, aes(x = Time, y = weight)) + 
  geom_point(aes(color = Diet)) + facet_wrap(~ Diet)+ 
  theme_classic()
```



```{r}
ggplot(ChickWeight, aes(x = Time, y = weight)) + geom_point(aes(color = Diet))+stat_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE, size = 1.3)  + facet_wrap(~ Diet)+ 
theme_classic()
```
